amendment.description: Amendment to require an applicant to provide information on its population of veteran and military students and how it will incorporate veteran and military student needs into its demonstration project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to require an applicant to provide information on its population of veteran and military students and how it will incorporate veteran and military student needs into its demonstration project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
